Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Grand Hotel Fleming in Rome (Cassia), you'll be close to Ponte Milvio and St. Peter's Basilica. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Parco di Villa Glori and National Academy of St. Cecilia.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 302 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and minibars. Rooms have private balconies. 22-inch flat-screen televisions with digital programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and bidets.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, shopping on site, and a television in the lobby.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Dining is also available at a coffee shop/café, and room service (during limited hours) is provided. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include high-speed (wired) Internet access (surcharge), a business center, and express check-in. Planning an event in Rome? This hotel has facilities measuring 1184 square feet (110 square meters), including a meeting room. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Dining is also available at a coffee shop/café, and room service (during limited hours) is provided. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Grand Hotel Fleming in Rome (Cassia), you'll be close to Ponte Milvio and St. Peter's Basilica. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Parco di Villa Glori and National Academy of St. Cecilia.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Ponte Milvio - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Parco di Villa Glori - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
National Academy of St. Cecilia - 1.5 km / 1 mi
Auditorium Parco della Musica - 1.5 km / 1 mi
MAXXI - National Museum of the 21st Century - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Stadio Flaminio - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Olympic Stadium - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Olympic Swimming Stadium - 2 km / 1.2 mi
Foro Italico - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Olimpico Theater - 2.2 km / 1.3 mi
Parioli Theatre - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
Nature Reserve of Monte Mario - 2.5 km / 1.6 mi
Villa Ada - 2.5 km / 1.6 mi
Villa Madama - 2.5 km / 1.6 mi
Parco di Roma Golf Club - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi

The nearest airports are:
Rome (CIA-Ciampino) - 18.7 km / 11.6 mi
Rome (FCO-Fiumicino - Leonardo da Vinci Intl.) - 24.8 km / 15.4 mi

The preferred airport for Grand Hotel Fleming is Rome (FCO-Fiumicino - Leonardo da Vinci Intl.).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Rome (FCO-Leonardo Da Vinci) - 24.8 km / 15.4 mi

The preferred airport for Grand Hotel Fleming is Rome (FCO-Leonardo Da Vinci).
